Harry Styles is her love child.
"[Harry Styles is] my love child. When Harry came into our lives, I said, 'Oh my God, this is...
body:
Stevie Nicks on Christine McVie, Rolling Stone Hall of Fame, and Game of Thrones

Harry Styles is her love child.

“[Harry Styles is] my love child. When Harry came into our lives, I said, ‘Oh my God, this is the son I never had.’ So I adopted him.” Help, I need a doctor. Please, I’m very unwell!

blog.name: waitingfortwilight
blog.title: Kate
blog.description: 23 but often grumbles like a 90 year old // oh so very English // I write about Harry, feedback is always appreciated, but be NICE or don’t bother // Requests are currently CLOSED // Masterlist Kiddies!

summary: Can you blurb something about Harry getting really upset after performing an emotional song for the first time and goes to you...
question: Can you blurb something about Harry getting really upset after performing an emotional song for the first time and goes to you for comfort?
answer:
IM SORRY THIS TOOK SO LONG ANGEL! I hope you love it!!!!! Kate xxx 💞

You were no stranger to feeling overwhelmed when it came to listening to Harry’s music. It was probably safe to say you’ve been reduced to nothing but a blubbering mess a handful of times when it came to one of his harder hitting numbers.

He’d never been one to tease you about it either, he was thankful that his music resonated with someone else apart from him. He’s never exactly been able to hide his emotion when performing sometimes, but he certainly holds himself together a hell of a lot better than you do.

Well, until today anyway.

Nearing the end of a new song he was treating a crowd to at the latest show of his tour, he suddenly found himself more overwhelmed than he’d imagined. You were confused for a moment as you watched him from the side, brows furrowing with concern as he just stopped singing.

Harry’s throat had closed up and dried out as a few uninvited tears spilled down his cheeks. He took a step backwards, lowering his head to the floor as the song came to a close.

You’ve heard the song before and also bawled your eyes out as he played it for you. Today was no particular exception since you’d let a few tear drops escape, but you weren’t snotting, not yet anyway.

Thankfully the arena never fell silent as the fans cheered their encouragement towards him, but as soon as the last note faded he held a hand up to the crowd before hurrying off.

You shared a nervous glance with Mitch who looked just as confused as you, and he simply shook his head as if to give you a silent ‘fuck knows’.

“Harry, what happened?” You ask as he pulls you off to one side slightly out of view.

His arms are around you, squashing your frame into his without breathing a word to you. It’s not unfamiliar, you’ve shared hugs before, you’ve been friends a long time. But this one felt different. He’d never squeezed you so tight that you were nearly incapable of breathing.

“H, I can’t,” you choke, patting his arm frantically, “can’t breathe.”

He quickly releases you, holding you by the shoulders as he looks you over with worry. “Sorry.” He mumbles.

“Look at you, your eyes are a state…” You pine over him, wiping his wet cheeks with your thumb.

“Promise you won’t leave me.” He demands through a shaky and strained voice.

You frown up at him, eyeing him with more worry as you gingerly rest your hands against his cheeks. “What are you talking about, why would I leave?”

“Please just…” He practically chokes, nuzzling his face into your hand, “just don’t leave.”

You delicately chuckle as you stroke a your thumb along his cheekbone. “I’m not leaving but your fans might if you don’t go back.”

Harry blinks and nods furiously with a light sigh. “Yeah, yeah.” He mumbles, like a sort of pep talk just for himself as he glances outwards to the stage.

You raise your brows as he stares off. “Go then…” You encourage, giving him a gentle nudge in the right direction.

He blinks and looks back to you, curls dancing excitedly with the movements of his head. “Yeah.” He hums, but takes you completely by surprise when he pecks a gentle kiss to your lips. “Thank you.” He grins back at you before hurrying off back towards the stage.

You stand still for a moment in amongst the excited screams for his return, staring blankly ahead of yourself as your fingers ghost over your lips. A hundred questions are running around your head now, and you don’t know which one is the most important.

Was it a subconscious thing? Or did he do it on purpose? Does he like you like that? Was it just a friendly kiss? Is that even a thing? Would he kiss you again when he finishes? Do you like him like that? Do you want him to kiss you again.

Yes.

You think you might have your answer…

~~~

I’ve recently learned to accept the fact that I’m just a soppy cow. Moo.

Tag list: @pxrrishly @permanentllyharry @ofpeppermintbay @talesofstyles @abundantlyabundant @joan-of-disappointment @staceystoleyourheart @hoeforhaz @behdhendud @harry12styles94 @belikebebe @harryismydaddy21 @meet-me-in-the-harry @joycelovedorial @evaolin @ijustloveharrystyles @harryisalittleshit @newtosaur250 @sydneys-life-blog @flowerrrrrchilddd @belle-ofthe-sea @grace-leigh

reblog.comment:
IM SORRY THIS TOOK SO LONG ANGEL! I hope you love it!!!!! Kate xxx 💞

You were no stranger to feeling overwhelmed when it came to listening to Harry’s music. It was probably safe to say you’ve been reduced to nothing but a blubbering mess a handful of times when it came to one of his harder hitting numbers.

He’d never been one to tease you about it either, he was thankful that his music resonated with someone else apart from him. He’s never exactly been able to hide his emotion when performing sometimes, but he certainly holds himself together a hell of a lot better than you do.

Well, until today anyway.

Nearing the end of a new song he was treating a crowd to at the latest show of his tour, he suddenly found himself more overwhelmed than he’d imagined. You were confused for a moment as you watched him from the side, brows furrowing with concern as he just stopped singing.

Harry’s throat had closed up and dried out as a few uninvited tears spilled down his cheeks. He took a step backwards, lowering his head to the floor as the song came to a close.

You’ve heard the song before and also bawled your eyes out as he played it for you. Today was no particular exception since you’d let a few tear drops escape, but you weren’t snotting, not yet anyway.

Thankfully the arena never fell silent as the fans cheered their encouragement towards him, but as soon as the last note faded he held a hand up to the crowd before hurrying off.

You shared a nervous glance with Mitch who looked just as confused as you, and he simply shook his head as if to give you a silent ‘fuck knows’.

“Harry, what happened?” You ask as he pulls you off to one side slightly out of view.

His arms are around you, squashing your frame into his without breathing a word to you. It’s not unfamiliar, you’ve shared hugs before, you’ve been friends a long time. But this one felt different. He’d never squeezed you so tight that you were nearly incapable of breathing.

“H, I can’t,” you choke, patting his arm frantically, “can’t breathe.”

He quickly releases you, holding you by the shoulders as he looks you over with worry. “Sorry.” He mumbles.

“Look at you, your eyes are a state…” You pine over him, wiping his wet cheeks with your thumb.

“Promise you won’t leave me.” He demands through a shaky and strained voice.

You frown up at him, eyeing him with more worry as you gingerly rest your hands against his cheeks. “What are you talking about, why would I leave?”

“Please just…” He practically chokes, nuzzling his face into your hand, “just don’t leave.”

You delicately chuckle as you stroke a your thumb along his cheekbone. “I’m not leaving but your fans might if you don’t go back.”

Harry blinks and nods furiously with a light sigh. “Yeah, yeah.” He mumbles, like a sort of pep talk just for himself as he glances outwards to the stage.

You raise your brows as he stares off. “Go then…” You encourage, giving him a gentle nudge in the right direction.

He blinks and looks back to you, curls dancing excitedly with the movements of his head. “Yeah.” He hums, but takes you completely by surprise when he pecks a gentle kiss to your lips. “Thank you.” He grins back at you before hurrying off back towards the stage.

You stand still for a moment in amongst the excited screams for his return, staring blankly ahead of yourself as your fingers ghost over your lips. A hundred questions are running around your head now, and you don’t know which one is the most important.

Was it a subconscious thing? Or did he do it on purpose? Does he like you like that? Was it just a friendly kiss? Is that even a thing? Would he kiss you again when he finishes? Do you like him like that? Do you want him to kiss you again.

Yes.

You think you might have your answer…

~~~

I’ve recently learned to accept the fact that I’m just a soppy cow. Moo.

that fuckung kid ruined my convo
summary: last night i had a dream that i was looking after some kids and i bumped into harry styles and we started chatting and really...
body: last night i had a dream that i was looking after some kids and i bumped into harry styles and we started chatting and really getting along until one of the kids said that they needed something to eat. luckily we were standing next to a buffet so the kid could eat and I could continue to talk to the music man however HOWEVER this bloody kid said that he didn’t want to eat from this buffet because it wasn’t “oRgAnIC” and the nearest organic buffet was up the stairs so i left the other kids with harry and took this one kid to get a single slice of melon from the organic buffet and when I came back to get the other kids and continue talking to harry he was gone and had left all the kids to fend for them selves. so in conclusion, kids ruin everything and harry styles should never have a job in child care

summary: Thank you so much for 100 followers! 🎉🎉
body:
Thank you so much for 100 followers! 🎉🎉

we reached 100 so quickly and I’m so grateful i hope everyone is liking my packs so far and remember requests are open! 🖤
